data.enText: large waves in the sea or ocean, and the white foam that they produce as they fall on the beach, on rocks, etc.
the sound of surf breaking on the beach
Sydney, surf capital of the world (= where the sport of surfing is very popular)
to take part in the sport of riding on waves on a surfboard

data.chText: 我正上网查找关于印度音乐的资料。
data.enText: I was surfing the Net looking for information on Indian music.

tr: look around casually and randomly, without seeking anything in particular
example: surf the internet or the world wide web

tr: ride the waves of the sea with a surfboard

value.def: Surf is the mass of white bubbles that is formed by waves as they fall upon the shore.
If you surf, you ride on big waves in the sea on a special board.

example.ex: I'm going to buy a surfboard and learn to surf...
example.tran: 我要买个冲浪板学习冲浪。

example.ex: I'm going to be surfing bigger waves when I get to Australia!
example.tran: 到了澳大利亚后我要去浪头更大的地方冲浪！

example.ex: ...this small fishing village, which continues to attract painters and surfers.
example.tran: 这个持续吸引着画家和冲浪者前来的小渔村

value.def: If you surf the Internet, you spend time finding and looking at things on the Internet.

example.ex: No one knows how many people currently surf the Net.
example.tran: 没人知道现在有多少人在网上冲浪。

example.ex: Net surfers can use their credit cards to pay for anything from toys to train tickets.
example.tran: 上网者能用信用卡购买从玩具到火车票的任何东西。

trans: 冲浪学校；冲浪运动学校；冲浪校园
地铁跑酷；地铁冲浪；天铁跑酷
上网；网上冲浪；上网冲浪
网上冲浪；上网；在网上冲浪；上网冲浪
碎波带；碎波帶；冲浪带；浪区；破浪带
